36_9ecb_0_3_3.raw: 1. Paraphrase: The leader of a polygamous community in western Canada, Winston Blackmore, who is known for having multiple wives and a large number of children, was #arrested# on Wednesday on charges of practicing polygamy. Blackmore, also known as the Bishop of Bountiful, leads a sect of around 400 people in Bountiful, British Columbia, and was previously the head of the Canadian branch of the Utah-based Fundamentalist Church of Jesus Christ of Latter Day Saints until he was expelled in 2003. Despite earlier legal opinions suggesting it would be challenging to bring criminal charges for polygamy, a special prosecutor was appointed last June to investigate allegations of criminal abuse in Bountiful, and Blackmore, who openly admits to his polygamous lifestyle but denies any sexual abuse of children, is now facing a charge of practicing polygamy.

SeaMicro, a company that emerged from stealth in 2010, has been known for its innovative server technology, including a 10U chassis packed with 512 single-core Atom servers, all connected by a 1.28Tb/sec 3D torus interconnect.
